description.info: I really believe my school days and my exposure to computers at this age is the foundation of what I am capable of doing today!
I started to explore vast domains ahead of me and found a routine to master my skills
A student body group which consists of like minded people, a society to grow and learn
It was a great experience to share my knowledge with others. I conducted a workshop on Python programming for my college juniors.
I was the coordinator for the technical symposium of my college. It was a great experience to work with a team and organize an event.
This was my first hackathon victory.. felt good for me!
I completed the eLearnSecurity Junior Penetration Tester certification. It was a great learning experience and helped me to understand the basics of penetration testing.
The interview was really a good experience! ngl...

description.emphasis: president of CSI (Computer Society of India) chapter at my college
description.info: I was elected as the president of the Computer Society of India chapter at my college. It is a great opportunity to lead a team and organize events related to computer science and technology.
